title: Law of supply and producer behavior

content.question: According to the law of supply, which of the following is true as the price of a good or service decreases?

choices.label: Producers are willing and able to sell more so they increase their sales.
Producers are willing and able to sell less because their production costs increase.
Producers are willing and able to sell less because their profits decrease.
Consumers are willing and able to buy more because they will switch from more expensive goods.
Consumers are willing and able to buy more because they will be able to afford a greater quantity.

content.answer: Producers are willing and able to sell less because their profits decrease.
